supplier_of: pet | import-export - rubber and plastic products | abs | ldpe | hdpe
information: Ciparo is a trading company, active in the market of used paper, pulp and plastic waste, based in Rotterdam. Founded in 1992, we now operate 5 branch offices in China (Golden Windmill), 2 offices in Vietnam as well as various regions in India and Indonesia. The grades we trade in vary from PET, HDPE, LDPE, PP (Big Bags), PS, ABS, PMMA etc. in plastic materials, to standard paper grades as OCC, NCC, OINP, magazine trimmings, but with a strong focus on specialty grades like filter paper, metalized paper, tissue papers and many more. Apart from waste paper, we also trade in rolls and sheets of paper (stock lots).
keywords: Import-export - rubber and plastic products, pet, abs, ldpe, HDPE
